sub_title: Masters at Utrecht University, BSc. Geology
summary:
Currently pursuing master's in Earth Science at Utrecht University.
Fellow of the Gemmological Association Of Great Britain.

I hold a keen interest in Planetary and Mineralogical sciences. I enjoy exploring niche topics within these fields using experimental and analytical approaches.

Lab-related skillset: 
- Experience in using SEM, UV-VIS spectrometry, and infrared spectroscopy.
- Working knowledge of Transmission Electron Microscopy, FIB-SEM, X-ray Diffraction, and Micro-CT
- 3D technology (Electric pulse disaggregation + Hydroseperation) developed by CNT minerals
- Gemology and mineralogy

Other Skills: 
- Blogging, science communication, and science outreach.
- Database organization 
- Digitalization (photogrammetric models) 

I like to cook, paint, and dance when not geeking out over minerals.

If you love Geology, go check out my blog page on Instagram: @geologium
